channel.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
channel.description:
Haxunit net acheiving 200m xp in construction using the gltich
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uey1v1utZmQ[/youtube]
How it was done (You need to full screen 720p the video to have a chance of seeing anything)
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ryihhB-FLE0[/youtube]
also N S X you may as well delete me XD (Halo c e)
Note: This may still partially work. I would highly recommend you DO NOT try it else you will end up the same way as I did.

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr

[/quote]

But isn’t that the same of nearly all glitches?[/quote]

Pretty much, yeah. That’s the excuse they gave though.

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Anieli:

The very first dungeonering xp bug was pretty much legit in the eyes of Jagex. Hundreds of people got away scott free and those who did get banned got the offence quashed anyway.

It was deemed to be a “use of unchecked Mechanics”.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

They will have motives for what their doing, its hard to believe but Jagex aren’t idiots. However, I may be wrong they may be idiots.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Surely if they paid attention to it then nobody would have survived? Or perhaps the system they set up only monitors rapid dungeonering xp gain because of the multiple bugs.

The very first dungeonering xp bug was pretty much legit in the eyes of Jagex. Hundreds of people got away scott free and those who did get banned got the offence quashed anyway.

It was only the later exploits which we started to see a huge increase in the amount of players banned for abusing the xp bug.(Excluding the prestige glitch which had a 0% ban rate but was only known to a few people.)

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Anieli:

I get why they ban people but I don’t get why they don’t have some kind of system which flags rapid xp gain like this? I mean all it would have to do is record when somebody gains over 5m/hr xp, how the person is gaining xp, amount gained and the date.

They do, they’ve stated they do before. I’m not 100% sure why they don’t pay attention to this system or they do and we’re just not aware of it. I have theories that would make sense logically for why though.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr

I love how Jagex bans people for this, but yet they exploit their own game every chance they get.

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:39, topic:477498”][quote author=Anieli link=topic=595692.msg4199852#msg4199852 date=1358030441]

I’d like to see a verified source to this assumption

And how exactly would I do that? Jagex are not going to admit that people got away with it are they?

And I’m not exactly going to give out the names or people who didn’t get banned for it because guess what would happen!
[/quote]Well then what you’re saying is just a bunch of crap. Just because some of your friends told you that they were told by a friend’s friend that they abused the bug and got away with it, doesn’t mean it’s true.[/quote]

I watched these accounts get 99… It was being quick chatted in the friends chat. I helped 2 people set it up over skype and neither of them are banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Anieli, post:36, topic:477498”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=595692.msg4197792#msg4197792 date=1357769533]
Jagex has already handled this situation. They banned anyone involved in the glitch.
[/quote]

They did not ban anyone involved in the glitch.

They banned lvl 4 accounts who started playing and got 99 construction on the same day.
They also banned all accounts which were previously known to abuse bugs and also all of the accounts of one particular bugabuser. The rest of the people got away with it.[/quote]

Jagex:

We also detected a small number of players who had engineered an exploit to abuse the God Statues content which was added yesterday. In addition to adding extra security to our code, we’ve permanently banned the accounts which took part and all other accounts associated with those users. Such exploitation is totally unacceptable and we have a zero tolerance policy against any such behaviour.

I think that proves you wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Construction XP bug 200m/xp hr
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:477498”]So what?

Jagex has no issue rolling back accounts.[/quote]

Actually that’s not true. They seem to have a massive problem with banning / rolling back accounts. Several of my friends remain unbanned. They banned all the accounts of one person in particular not everyone involved so pretty much they just lied to everyone that read that post.

Unless you were previously known to Jagex or you were a level 4 account which got 99 construction and started playing the same day you have, for now anyway, gotten away with it.

Read full topic
